summary: A doctor and his girlfriend are stalked by a woman who claims to be in love with him. Meanwhile, the man falls in love with a younger woman. Based on a true story.
cast: David Morrissey|Alex Lowe|Tara Fitzgerald|Dearbhla Molloy|Michael Elwyn|Thomas Craig|Alexis Zegerman|Richard Lumsden|Lucy Griffiths|Susannah Wise|Jan Francis|John McArdle|Kate Steavenson-Payne|Monica Dolan|David Groves|Simon Snashall|Lucas Hare|Paul Bridle|Sean Blowers|David Kennedy|Lucy Robinson|Guy Henry|Guy Lankester|Sam Bond|Andi Osho|Daniel Betts|George Pensotti|Pip Torrens|Beverley Beck|Malcolm Davies|Chris Wilson
title: U Be Dead
